document_data.caption: The rod of cats (second from left).
document_data.name: Rod of Cats
document_data.mainbody: A '''''rod of cats''''' was a magical [[rod]] that granted powers associated with felines and thievery.
document_data.Description: It was a black wooden staff 7 feet (2.1 meters) in length, with a carved [[cat]]'s head on a knob at one end.
document_data.Powers:
It could be wielded as a ''+1 [[quarterstaff]]''. When held, the ''rod of cats'' greatly improved the wielder's ability to climb, hide, move stealthily, and see in low light conditions.

Once per day, the wielder could use the rod to cast ''[[darkness]]'', but only upon the rod. Anyone holding the ''rod of cats'' was immune to this spell's effects.

There was a hidden compartment in the rod but it was only large enough to hold a [[scroll]] or some [[thieves' tools]].
document_data.Creation: Creation of this rod required the spells ''[[cat's grace]]'', ''darkness'', ''[[darkvision]]'', and ''[[spider climb]]''.
